job.title: Data Scientist (Remote)
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtltugtData Scientist RemoteltugtltstronggtltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtOur PharmaMed Device client based out of Massachusetts is looking to hire a Junior to MidLevel Data Scientist for a 100 remote  opportunity This role starts as a contract but has the potential to go full time Unfortunately our client is not able to sponsor at this time so W2 candidates are encouraged to applyltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtThe right candidate will possessltpgtltulgtltligt3 years of experience serving as a Data ScientistBI DeveloperltligtltligtExperience taking raw data and transforming it into visualizationinsights for SMEsltligtltligtExperience with Salesforcecom Marketing Cloud and a knowledge of conversion funnel using SFDCltligtltligtExperience with BI tools such as Tableau or Spotfire a mustltligtltligtScripting languages such as Python R or MATLABltligtltligtAbility to write and run SQL database queriesltligtltligtExperience in data wrangling data cleaning and machine learningltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtFor immediate consideration please send your most recent resume toampnbspmsalemifootbridgeconsultingcomampnbspltpgt
